verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana umenichunguza
na kunipepesa mwenendo wangu
Bwana umenichunguza.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mimi mtu wa dhambi
ninatangatanga duniani.
Sina hata rafiki,
sina mtu wa kunifariji.
Ndugu zangu wamenikimbia
na kunitoroka mimi
Bwana ndiwe tegemeo
langu maishani. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Watu wanashauriana
juu yangu.
Mi mtumishi wako,
mimi mtumishi wako.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana unisikilize
na uwaaibishe adui zangu
Bwana unisikilize.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bwana wewe wanijua
wewe wanijua kuliko wote,
Bwana wewe wanijua.
